references.paper_title: The Cityscapes dataset for semantic urban scene understanding
references.reason: It is one of the five driving scene semantic segmentation datasets used for validation in this paper, providing a benchmark for comparing the performance of different domain generalized semantic segmentation methods.

references.paper_title: BDD100K: A diverse driving video database with scalable annotation tooling
references.reason: It is one of the five driving scene semantic segmentation datasets used for validation in this paper, offering a large-scale and diverse dataset for training and evaluating domain generalization methods.

references.paper_title: The Mapillary vistas dataset for semantic understanding of street scenes
references.reason: It is one of the five driving scene semantic segmentation datasets used for validation in this paper, providing a large collection of real-world street-level images with semantic annotations.

references.paper_title: The SYNTHIA dataset: A large collection of synthetic images for semantic segmentation of urban scenes
references.reason: It is one of the five driving scene semantic segmentation datasets used for validation in this paper, offering a large-scale synthetic dataset for training and testing domain generalization methods.

references.paper_title: Playing for data: Ground truth from computer games
references.reason: It is one of the five driving scene semantic segmentation datasets used for validation in this paper, providing a large-scale synthetic dataset with high-quality pixel-level annotations.
